kit::Count

kit::Count Class Reference

#include <kit.h>

 ~Count ()

void ls (std::ostream &os=std::cout)
 List counts (default = list to screen).

Detailed Description

Model a count as a function object. Each time the (function) object is called, the count is incremented for the given string. The object is self-initializing; that is, there is no need for an explicit zeroing of the count. 

     Usage:
     
     Count count;
     : :
     // increment count
     count("Selected Muon");
     
     // To display the counts at the end, do
     : :
     count.ls();
